text: @GovMikeDeWine Back on 3/12, Gov. DeWine said “We’re going to do what we have to do and ask for forgiveness later”. https://t.co/l4msMV1yzk Well it looks like the time for begging begins this Friday, 6/19, at 10am! Acton didn’t resign either, she fell on her own sword to protect #TheTinyTyrant! https://t.co/M9wiATP1CJ
